data.base_url_description: Enter the base URL for the Sensus Analytics API (e.g., https://api.sensus.com).
data.account_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics account number.
data.meter_number_description: Enter your Sensus Analytics meter number.
data.unit_type_description: Select the unit type. 'CF' stands for Cubic Feet and 'G' stands for Gallons.
data.tier1_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 1. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.tier1_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 1 (e.g., 0.0128).
data.tier2_gallons_description: Enter the number of gallons for Tier 2. Leave blank if not applicable.
data.tier2_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 2 (e.g., 0.0150).
data.tier3_price_description: Enter the price per gallon for Tier 3 (e.g., 0.0175).
data.service_fee_description: Enter the fixed service fee amount (e.g., 15.00).
